page.title: 06A Child's Day in Pimperne.
page.content: My name is Stephen Witt.I get up at about 7.30 am,go downstairs and have Shreddies and apple juice for breakfast.Then I get dressed for school.I wash and then play on my computer. We go round for Paul and Christopher Amey to drop Chris and my brother at the Middle School.When we get to Pimperne I do some work. We may have Physical Education and then do Mathematics or English. Then we have our sandwiches for dinner .In the afternoon we may do Diary or S.R.A then we go out and play Touch.Then we work for a while and have a story. When I go home I get ready for Cubs, we first do Flag Break,play a game and go home to bed.
